name: 15 Seconds TO DIE
description:
a difficult obstacle course ,15 seconds to compleate it, all of this, just to Die?

15 Seconds TO DIE is a 2d platformer, where you need to traverse an obstacle course without dying, but the particular thing is that the goal, is a shiny deadly Spike, the wich you need to collide with and kill yourself.

Many will think "Well why can't i kill myself with the other spikes?"  Well, i have no idea. all i know is that usually death is permanent, Thus after killing yourself there is NO WAY BACK , so don't do it,  well don't do it in real life, but in 15 Seconds TO DIE Committing the unthinkable is a Must.

this game was a submission for the Whisker Jam 2022
